issue.message: This call is to a method from API 19, the call containing class androidx.media2.common.MediaMetadata.BitmapEntry is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 19. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(19) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(19).
This method should be called `getMediaItem` such that `mediaItem` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#nullability-annotations
Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#nullability-annotations
Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#nullability-annotations
Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#nullability-annotations
